devdoc.details: This library is deployed and used as an external library by ClearingHouse contract.

params.accountMarketValue: shows the account market value before liquidation
params.totalRequiredMargin: shows the total required margin before liquidation

params.poolId: shows the poolId for which range is active

params.accountMarketValue: shows the account market value after the transaction is executed
params.totalRequiredMargin: shows the total required margin after the transaction is executed

params.totalProfit: shows the value of positions at the time of execution after removing amount specified

LiquidityPositionsLiquidated(uint256,add.details: all range positions are liquidated and the current tokens inside the range are added in as token positions to the account

params.insuranceFundFee: total liquidaiton fee paid to the insurance fund (can be negative in case the account is not enought to cover the fee)
params.keeperAddress: address of keeper who performed the liquidation
params.keeperFee: total liquidaiton fee paid to the keeper (positive only)
params.liquidationFee: total liquidation fee charged to the account

params.collateralId: token in which margin is deposited

TokenPositionLiquidated(uint256,uint32,i.details: the selected token position is take from the current account and moved to liquidatorAccount at a discounted prive to current pool price

params.insuranceFundFee: total liquidaiton fee paid to the insurance fund (can be negative in case the account is not enough to cover the fee)
params.keeperFee: total liquidaiton fee paid to keeper
params.poolId: id of the rage trade pool for whose position was liquidated

params.isInitialMargin: true to use initialMarginFactor and false to use maintainance margin factor for calcualtion of required margin
params.protocol: set of all constants and token addresses
set of all constants and token addresses
set of all constants and token addresses

returns.accountPositionProfits: total market value of all the positions (token ) and deposits

getAccountValueAndRequiredMargin(Account.details: (In case requiredMargin < minRequiredMargin then requiredMargin = minRequiredMargin)

params.isInitialMargin: true to use initial margin factor and false to use maintainance margin factor for calcualtion of required margin
params.protocol: set of all constants and token addresses

returns.accountMarketValue: total market value of all the positions (token ) and deposits
returns.totalRequiredMargin: total margin required to keep the account above selected margin requirement (intial/maintainance)

returns.collateralDeposits: list of all the collateral amounts
returns.tokenPositions: list of all the token and liquidity positions
returns.vQuoteBalance: amount of vQuote in the account

returns.netPosition: net position of the account for the pool

liquidateLiquidityPositions(Account.Info.details: insurance fund covers the remaining fee if the account market value is not enough

params.protocol: set of all constants and token addresses

returns.insuranceFundFee: amount of liquidation fee paid to insurance fund
returns.keeperFee: amount of liquidation fee paid to keeper

liquidateTokenPosition(Account.Info stor.details: closes position uptil a specified slippage threshold in protocol.liquidationParamsinsurance fund covers the remaining fee if the account market value is not enoughif there is range position this reverts (liquidators are supposed to liquidate range positions first)

params.poolId: id of the pool to liquidate
params.protocol: set of all constants and token addresses

returns.insuranceFundFee: amount of liquidation fee paid to insurance fund
returns.keeperFee: amount of liquidation fee paid to keeper

params.liquidityChangeParams: parameters including lower tick, upper tick, liquidity delta, sqrtPriceCurrent, slippageToleranceBps, closeTokenPosition, limit order type
params.poolId: id of the rage trade pool
params.protocol: set of all constants and token addresses

params.poolId: id of the pool for the range
params.tickLower: lower tick index for the range
params.tickUpper: upper tick index for the range

params.checkMargin: true to check if margin is available else false
params.poolId: id of the pool to swap tokens for
params.protocol: set of all constants and token addresses
params.swapParams: parameters for the swap (Includes - amount, sqrtPriceLimit, isNotional, isPartialAllowed)

returns.vQuoteAmountOut: amount of vQuote after swap (user receiving then +ve, user paying then -ve)
returns.vTokenAmountOut: amount of vToken after swap (user receiving then +ve, user paying then -ve)

params.amount: amount of token to deposit or withdraw
params.checkMargin: true to check if margin is available else false
params.protocol: set of all constants and token addresses

params.amount: amount of profit(settlement token) to add/remove
params.checkMargin: true to check if margin is available else false
params.protocol: set of all constants and token addresses

devdoc.title: Cross margined account functions

InvalidLiquidationAccountAboveWater(int2.notice: error to denote that there is enough margin, hence the liquidation is invalid

InvalidLiquidationActiveRangePresent(uin.notice: error to denote that there are active ranges present during token liquidation, hence the liquidation is invalid

InvalidTransactionNotEnoughMargin(int256.notice: error to denote that there is not enough margin for the transaction to go through

InvalidTransactionNotEnoughProfit(int256.notice: error to denote that there is not enough profit during profit withdrawal

MarginUpdated(uint256,uint32,int256,bool.notice: denotes add or remove of margin

ProfitUpdated(uint256,int256).notice: denotes withdrawal of profit in settlement token

checkIfMarginAvailable(Account.Info stor.notice: checks if market value > required margin else revert with InvalidTransactionNotEnoughMargin

checkIfProfitAvailable(Account.Info stor.notice: checks if profit is available to withdraw settlement token (token value of all positions > 0) else revert with InvalidTransactionNotEnoughProfit

getAccountPositionProfits(Account.Info s.notice: returns market value for the account positions based on current market conditions

getAccountValueAndRequiredMargin(Account.notice: returns market value and required margin for the account based on current market conditions

getInfo(Account.Info storage,Protocol.In.notice: gets information about all the collateral and positions in the account

getNetPosition(Account.Info storage,uint.notice: gets the net position of the account for a given pool

liquidateLiquidityPositions(Account.Info.notice: liquidates all range positions in case the account is under water     charges a liquidation fee to the account and pays partially to the insurance fund and rest to the keeper.

liquidateTokenPosition(Account.Info stor.notice: liquidates token position specified by 'poolId' in case account is underwater     charges a liquidation fee to the account and pays partially to the insurance fund and rest to the keeper.

liquidityChange(Account.Info storage,uin.notice: changes range liquidity 'vToken' of market value equal to 'vTokenNotional'if 'liquidityDelta'>0 then liquidity is added and if 'liquidityChange'<0 then liquidity is removedthe liquidity change is reverted if the sqrt price at the time of execution is beyond 'slippageToleranceBps' of 'sqrtPriceCurrent' suppliedwhenever liquidity change is done the external token position is taken out. If 'closeTokenPosition' is true this is swapped out else it is added to the current token position

removeLimitOrder(Account.Info storage,ui.notice: removes limit order based on the current price position (keeper call)

swapToken(Account.Info storage,uint32,IC.notice: swaps 'vToken' of token amount equal to 'swapParams.amount'if vTokenAmount>0 then the swap is a long or close short and if vTokenAmount<0 then swap is a short or close longisNotional specifies whether the amount represents token amount (false) or vQuote amount(true)isPartialAllowed specifies whether to revert (false) or to execute a partial swap (true)sqrtPriceLimit threshold sqrt price which if crossed then revert or execute partial swap

updateProfit(Account.Info storage,int256.notice: updates 'amount' of profit generated in settlement token
